name: Last Space Raider
description:
Reminder, follow 8080 for notifications on updates ! Let's keep Amiga alive and prosper! Most important is to have fun!

Your payment/tip is a contribution for my Amiga projects ;)

Last Space Raider

Earth is under attack! Everything has gone south, you are the Last Space Raider, a prototype is in your disposal to fight the enemy

You are earth last hope, may spirits be with you!

In game: AD-move, RShift-fire, P-pause, Esc-Exit

In menu, y-Start game, esc-quit

Minimum requirements:

110MIPS ?  

1080p (FullHD) version is for superfast Amigas

AmigaOS 3.x, AHI installed

RTG card 1280x720x16

68040/060 (FPU is required)

As usual don't expect a AAA game, it's done in AmiBlitz3
